title: HOUR 1 - Bears-Steelers, Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Bears-Steelers, Aaron Rodgers
description:
Thoughts on the Bears-Steelers game last night

Aaron Rodgers is overreacting by saying he feels like he's being "crucified"

How Rodgers should handle the media going forward


Guest: Brock Huard
